#summary A summary of the features demonstrated in the loan form

= Introduction =

The [https://ubiquity-xforms.googlecode.com/svn/branches/xforms-tests-and-examples/_samples/Loan/loan.html XForms Loan Application Form] demonstrates various XForms features, not all of which are implemented in ubiquity-xforms.  What follows is a list of all such features.

= Implemented Features =

  * [FeatureModel model]
  * [FeatureBind bind]
  * [FeatureSetValue setvalue]
  * [FeatureOutput output]
  * [FeatureInput input]
  * [FeatureSubmit submit]

 
= Incomplete Features =

  * [FeatureInlineInstances inline instances]
  * [FeatureSubmission submission]

= Unimplemented Features =

  * [FeatureSelect1 select1]
    * [FeatureItem item]
      * [FeatureValue value]
  * [FeatureAlert alert]
  * [FeatureHint hint]
  * [FeatureValidation validation]
